name: MPFPS - LanGamerAndDev
description:
This game was made by the Lan Gamer And Dev.
This is a demo, and does not represent the final state of the game.

With this demo, you can play DM with bots and / or against players on a map called Shipment made by Dryghor, you can share your IP with your friends and host a server (listen server for the demo).

The default Unreal port is 7777.

This game was made with the FPS Multiplayer Template 4.0 on Unreal Engine 5, with the weapons from Marat K, Rebel Throp, Infima Games and much more.

It took me 2 years to get this result, and I have so much more to do !

Here is my Youtube channel if you want to join me :)

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWj5zgvGpHjTpwAb8Rs1JHw

Take care and thanks for testing.
